cast.name: 穆罕默德·齐尚·艾布 Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub
希玛·比斯瓦斯 Seema Biswas
安佳丽·帕蒂尔 Anjali Patil
舒普洛特·道特 Subrat Dutta

introduction: After a series of bomb blasts in Hyderabad a special ATS team lead by officer Desai name Yasin Darji as the suspect. Following a tip-off, the team reaches a location to arrest Yasin only to end up arresting Sameer, the wrong guy. While the error needs to be fixed, the higher authorities decide to bargain with Sameer for his freedom, sending him as a mole. Sameer turns a mole to stop Yasin Darji before he kills more innocent people. A chase begins. Will they manage to stop Yasin, or will Yasin triumph?
